content: मैथुन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मिथुपेन निर्वृत्तं अण्] {@--1@} Paired, coupled. {@--2@} United by marriage. {@--3@} Relating to copula tion. --नं {@--1@} Copulation, sexual union; मृतं मैथुनमप्रजं <ls>Pt. 2. 94.</ls> {@--2@} Marriage. {@--3@} Union, connection. {@--4@} Consecrating the fire (अग्न्याधान).
